name: Steppy Pants Showdown
description:
Steppy Pants Showdown is a multiplayer title powered by the Skillz Competition platform.

You can compete directly against opponents in head-to-head matches and fight for top spots in leagues and leaderboards！

Keep your cool when faced with insurmountable odds, like reckless drivers and an inexplicable inability to avoid sidewalk cracks.

Privacy Policy: https://www.yodo1.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.yodo1.com/terms-of-use
